parts.text:
Slurm

```json
{
  "application": "Slurm",
  "description": "The script is designed to run a series of machine learning tasks using TensorFlow within a Slurm environment.  The script leverages Singularity for containerization, and the tasks involve preprocessing, training, and predicting using a convolutional neural network (CNN) for land cover classification.  The script prepares several Slurm job submission scripts, each targeting a different configuration of the model, and submits these scripts to the Slurm scheduler for execution.",
  "software": [
    "Slurm",
    "Singularity",
    "TensorFlow",
    "Python"
  ],
  "resources": [
    "CPU",
    "GPU",
    "disk space",
    "network bandwidth"
  ],
  "details": {
    "slurm": {
      "job_name": "3sl",
      "time_limit": "05-00:00:00",
      "nodes": 1,
      "tasks_per_node": 1,
      "environment": "ALL",
      "output": "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/projects/Senegal/Distributed-Runs/$USER/slurm-%j-stdout.out",
      "error": "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/projects/Senegal/Distributed-Runs/$USER/slurm-%j-stderr.out",
      "mail_user": "jordan.a.caraballo-vega@nasa.gov",
      "mail_type": "ALL"
    },
    "singularity": {
      "container": "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/containers/tensorflow-caney-2023.05"
    },
    "tensorflow": {
      "framework": "tf.keras",
      "python_path": "/explore/nobackup/people/jacaraba/development/tensorflow-caney"
    },
    "data": [
      "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/projects/Senegal/Distributed-Runs/$USER",
      "/explore/nobackup/people/jacaraba/development/senegal-lcluc-tensorflow/senegal_lcluc_tensorflow/view/landcover_cnn_pipeline_cli.py",
      "/explore/nobackup/people/jacaraba/development/senegal-lcluc-tensorflow/projects/land_cover/configs/experiments/20230309-cas-wcas-otcb",
      "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/containers/tensorflow-caney-2023.05",
      "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/projects/Senegal/Distributed-Runs/$USER",
      "/explore/nobackup/projects/ilab/projects/Senegal/Distributed-Runs/$USER"
    ],
    "config_files": [
      "land_cover_otcb_cas-wcas_local-std_30.yaml",
      "land_cover_otcb_cas-wcas_local-std_40.yaml",
      "land_cover_otcb_cas-wcas_local-std_50.yaml",
      "land_cover_otcb_cas-wcas_global-std_40TS.yaml"
    ],
    "data_files": [
      "land_cover_512_otcb_30TS_cas-wcas.csv",
      "land_cover_512_otcb_40TS_cas-wcas.csv",
      "land_cover_512_otcb_50TS_cas-wcas.csv",
      "land_cover_512_otcb_30TS_cas-wcas.csv"
    ]
  }
}
```
